definition: talus slide/to crumble (of scree slope)/to collapse/landslide
to collapse/to fall into ruins/death of king or emperor/demise

sentences.english: It was decided to buttress the crumbling walls.
sentences.chinese: 人们决定建造扶壁以支撑崩塌中的墙。

sentences.english: The earthquake makes the wall sink and start to crumble.
sentences.chinese: 这次地震把这堵墙震得下陷并开始崩塌。

sentences.english: The ground subsidence was due to collapse of loess soil caused by applying irrigation water.
sentences.chinese: 地表沉陷是由灌溉水的充填引起黄土结构崩塌造成的。

sentences.english: In either case, the final collapse can be sudden, Currens said.
sentences.chinese: 无论哪种方式，最终的崩塌都是瞬间性的。

sentences.english: Lineages are the result of holograms collapsing and fragmenting into many pieces.
sentences.chinese: 血统是全息崩塌并碎成许多片段的结果。

sentences.english: They had saved for a decade to build the small brick-and-tile home which crashed to the ground in minutes.
sentences.chinese: 他们攒了十年钱盖的砖瓦结构的房子几分钟就崩塌了。

sentences.english: A masonry chimney that could crumble and fall through an unsupported roof.
sentences.chinese: 石制烟囱压垮无支撑的房顶并崩塌。

sentences.english: The bay (image right) is filled with slush and icebergs from the collapsed shelf.
sentences.chinese: 图右侧的海湾中堆满了冰架崩塌后留下的积雪和冰山。

sentences.english: The heavy rain crazy black sky drop from the clouds, like the collapse of.
sentences.chinese: 大雨疯狂地从天而降，黑沉沉的天就像要崩塌下来。

sentences.english: At 9:50 a. m. , forty-five minutes after it had been hit, the South Tower fell.
sentences.chinese: 九点五十分，遭撞击四十五分钟之后，南塔崩塌。

sentences.english: A  masonry chimney that could crumble and fall through an unsupported roof.
sentences.chinese: 石制烟囱可能压垮无支撑的房顶并崩塌。

sentences.english: Cuihua Mountain can be divided into two areas, the Landslide area and the Developed area.
sentences.chinese: 翠华山可分为两个地区，山崩景观区和崩塌形成区。

sentences.english: The Roman Empire lasted for centuries. The American one collapsed overnight.
sentences.chinese: 罗马帝国持续了几个世纪，美国却在一夜间崩塌。

sentences.english: Triggered by the housing collapse, this edifice toppled in 2008.
sentences.chinese: 房地产市场的崩溃导致这座大厦在2008年崩塌。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the fifth stage of magmatism corresponds to the post-orogenic collapse episode.
sentences.chinese: 同时，第五阶段岩浆活动对应于造山后崩塌阶段。

sentences.english: Volcanic tremor is due to the oscillation of magmatic gas or due to the crater-wall downfall.
sentences.chinese: 火山地震由火山气体振荡或火山口内壁崩塌引起。

definition: crash/breakdown (of social values etc)/burst/to crumble/to collapse
to collapse (of building, dam or bridge)
to collapse and fall apart (idiom); to break up/falling to pieces
to rupture/to burst open/to break up
heaven falls and earth rends (idiom); rocked by a major disaster/fig. violent revolution/major social upheaval
